gen:link.label:label: BV441: The "Net (of reinsurance/SPV) best estimate and TP calculated as a whole provisions" reported for "Index-linked and unit-linked insurance obligations" in the template S.28.02 - Minimum Capital Requirement - Both life and non-life insurance activity should be equal or higher than the following computation from template S.12.01. - Life and Health SLT Technical Provisions: "Technical provisions calculated as a whole" for the specific LoB and correspondent accepted reinsurance minus "Total Recoverables from reinsurance/SPV and Finite Re after the adjustment for expected losses due to counterparty default associated to TP as a whole" for the specific LoB plus "Amount of the transitional on Technical Provisions" and "Best estimate minus recoverables from reinsurance/SPV and Finite Re - total" for the specific LoB and correspondent accepted. -->Template 1: S.12.01; Template 2: S.28.02; Expression: {S.28.02, r0230,c0090}+{S.28.02, r0230,c0110}>={S.12.01, r0010,c0030}-{S.12.01, r0020,c0030}+{S.12.01, r0110,c0030}+{S.12.01, r0090,c0040}+{S.12.01, r0090,c0050}+{S.12.01, r0120,c0040}+{S.12.01, r0120,c0050}+{S.12.01, r0010,c0120}-{S.12.01, r0020,c0120}+{S.12.01, r0030,c0120}-{S.12.01, r0080,c0120}+{S.12.01, r0110,c0100}+{S.12.01, r0120,c0100}

BV441: The "Net (of reinsurance/SPV) best estimate and TP calculated as a whole provisions" reported for "Index-linked and unit-linked insurance obligations" in the template S.28.02 - Minimum Capital Requirement - Both life and non-life insurance activity should be equal or higher than the following computation from template S.12.01. - Life and Health SLT Technical Provisions: "Technical provisions calculated as a whole" for the specific LoB and correspondent accepted reinsurance minus "Total Recoverables from reinsurance/SPV and Finite Re after the adjustment for expected losses due to counterparty default associated to TP as a whole" for the specific LoB plus "Amount of the transitional on Technical Provisions" and "Best estimate minus recoverables from reinsurance/SPV and Finite Re - total" for the specific LoB and correspondent accepted. -->Template 1: S.12.01; Template 2: S.28.02; Expression: {S.28.02, r0230,c0090}+{S.28.02, r0230,c0110}>={S.12.01, r0010,c0030}-{S.12.01, r0020,c0030}+{S.12.01, r0110,c0030}+{S.12.01, r0090,c0040}+{S.12.01, r0090,c0050}+{S.12.01, r0120,c0040}+{S.12.01, r0120,c0050}+{S.12.01, r0010,c0120}-{S.12.01, r0020,c0120}+{S.12.01, r0030,c0120}-{S.12.01, r0080,c0120}+{S.12.01, r0110,c0100}+{S.12.01, r0120,c0100}
